an10.212:1.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an10.212:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti luddo lohitapani hatapahate nivittho adayapanno sabbapanabhutesu.
an10.212:2.12: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam niraye.
an10.212:3.1: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge.
an10.212:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipatam pahaya panatipata pativirato hoti nihitadando nihitasattho lajji dayapanno, sabbapanabhutahitanukampi viharati.
an10.212:4.4: pisunam vacam pahaya pisunaya vacaya pativirato hoti …
an10.212:4.5: pharusam vacam pahaya pharusaya vacaya pativirato hoti …
an10.212:4.10: ‘atthi dinnam …pe… ye imanca lokam paranca lokam sayam abhinna sacchikatva pavedenti’ti.
an10.212:4.11: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannagato yathabhatam nikkhitto evam sagge”ti.
